doc.field: Twin Cities Metro Area 100m and 1000m US National Grid
Twin Cities Metro Area 100m and 1000m US National Grid

This dataset contains both line and polygon shape files for both 100 meter and 1000 meter US National Grid cells. The US National Grid is an FGDC map presentation standard (FGDC-STD-011-2001). These datasets were created to match the location reference system used by that standard. The reference system is based on NAD 83 UTM Coordinates and the Military Grid Reference System.
For more information on the USNG visit these helpful resources:
http://www.fgdc.gov/usng - FGDC USNG Site includes links to an executive summary, the standard itself, and other useful references.
http://mississippi.deltastate.edu/ - Delta State University USNG page includes links to statewide USNG downloads, learning materials, and ways to get involved in USNG promotion.
http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis/extensions/usng/index.html - ESRI provides a free extension to ArcMap that facilitates the use of the National Grid.

Attributes supplement the spatial information for labeling and identification purposes. Attribute accuracy has not been measured, but is presumed correct.</attraccr> </attracc> <logic>The dataset is topologically 'clean'.</logic> <complete>Entire seven county geographic area is covered.</complete> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar>This dataset was calculated mathematically to represent the US National Grid at 100 meter and 1000 meter grid cell sizes. Gridlines are accurate to less than one tenth of a meter.</horizpar> </horizpa> <vertacc> <vertaccr /> </vertacc> </posacc> <lineage> <procstep> <procdesc>Polygon layer attribute schema was taken from a National Grid dataset at 1000 meters covering the state of Minnesota downloaded from Delta State University.
Polygons were constructed with ArcMap. Lines were derived from polygons.</procdesc> </procstep> <srcinfo> <srcscale /> </srcinfo> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref /> <direct>Vector</direct> <mgmg3obj>polygon shapes</mgmg3obj> <mgmg3til>One layer for entire seven county region.</mgmg3til> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <geograph> <latres /> <longres /> <geogunit /> </geograph> <planar> <gridsys> <gridsysn>UTM</gridsysn> <utm> <utmzone>15</utmzone> </utm> <spcs> <spcszone /> </spcs> <mgmg4coz /> <mgmg4adj /> </gridsys> <mapproj> <mapprojn /> <mgmg4par /> <otherprj /> </mapproj> <planci> <plandu>Meters</plandu> <coordrep> <absres /> <ordres /> </coordrep> </planci> </planar> <geodetic> <ellips>GRS80</ellips> <horizdn>NAD83</horizdn> </geodetic> </horizsys> </spref> <eainfo> <overview> <eaover>This dataset is composed of two polygon shapefiles and two line shapefiles:
USNG_Metro100_a.shp - 100 meter polygon US National Grid covering the Twin Cities Metropolitan Area
USNG_Metro1000_a.shp - 1000 meter polygon US National Grid covering the Twin Cities Metropolitan Area
USNG_Metro100_l.shp - 100 meter line US National Grid covering the Twin Cities Metropolitan Area.
USNG_Metro1000_l.shp - 1000 meter line US National Grid covering the Twin Cities Metropolitan Area
Definitions for each attribute table follow. Field lengths and types for all attributes are listed at the bottom.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Attributes for polygon shapefiles. See FGDC-STD-011-2001 for more explanation of fields and how to use the information in USNG mapping product:
NORTHINGS: Northings portion of local coordinates of bottom left corner of grid polygon.
EASTINGS: Eastings portion of local coordinates of bottom left corner of grid polygon.
GRID1MIL: US National Grid Zone designation.
GRID100K: US National Grid 100,000 meter Grid Zone designation.
USNG: US National Grid code
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Attributes for line shapefiles. See FGDC-STD-011-2001 for more explanation of fields and how to use the information in USNG mapping product:
DIMENSION: Indicates dimension of line measures. 'N' for Northings, 'E' for Eastings
GRID1MIL: US National Grid Zone designation.
GRID100K: US National Grid 100,000 meter Grid Zone designation.
UTM_PRE: UTM Prefix - used for labeling map
PRINCE_DIG: Principal Digits - used for labeling map
UTM_SUF: UTM Suffix - used for labeling map.
------------------------------------------------------------------------ Field types and lengths using ArcGIS 9x terminology
NORTHINGS Text 10 EASTINGS Text 10 GRID1MIL Text 3 GRID100K Text 2 USNG Text 22</eaover> <eadetcit /> </overview> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Mark Kotz</cntper> <cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Database Administrator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> mailing and physical address </addrtype> <address>390 Robert Street North</address> <city>St. Paul</city> <state>Minnesota</state> <postal>55101-1805</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651-602-1644</cntvoice> <cntfax>651-602-1674</cntfax> <cntemail>mark.kotz@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>USNGMetro</resdesc> <distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13). Additionally, this dataset is available for direct use via one or more map services. More information about what a web mapping service is can be found at http://www.datafinder.org/services/.
